title: Freaky Vegan
about: Search for vegan cafes and restaurants, order ingredients, cakes and meals.

title: Smart-Brainer
about: This application detects faces on pasted images. Can use with any fictional email addresses!

title: Horsie Chess Board
about: Place down your Knight on the chess board and see how many moves you have, where to move from that field.

title: Can't Do It All
about: One have to choose between coding, social life and sleeping. Can't do it all... especially nowadays.

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
about: Search villagers from the new Nintendo game Animal Crossing: New Horizons through a free API.

title: Breaking Text
about: Write or insert text into the input field, then brake lines at the given number.

title: Infinite Carousel
about: A vanilla javascript infinite carousel with my favourite music albums. Alt-J, Beck, John Coffey, Portugal the Man, Radiohead, etc.

title: Array Implementation
about: Array practice: create an array from scratch, with constructors, methods.

title: Comparing Arrays
about: Array practice: compare two arrays with 'O(a+b' time complexity.

title: The Shopping List
about: A simple, mandatory shopping list with random colored item backgrounds. Everything you need!

title: UX/UI Portfolio Design
about: A mobile portfolio design from hand drawn sketches to wireframes to prototype preview.
